text: Lukáš Klimeš (born July 14, 1994) is a Czech professional ice hockey goalie. He is currently playing for HC ZUBR Přerov of the Czech 1.liga. Klimeš made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Kometa Brno during the 2014-15 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:HC Kometa Brno players Category:HC ZUBR Přerov players Category:Czech ice hockey goaltenders Category:Sportspeople from Brno
title: Lukáš Klimeš
